text:
- Qivos is an awarded
marketing technology agency
specializing in creating customer loyalty
through data driven marketing.

Qivos supports brands
to collect customer data

and build what we call the
unified customer profile.

Then we apply advanced analytics
in order to build personas
and provide a much more personalized task
throughout the whole customer journey.

Qivos vision is to keep
making people smile

whenever they get a message
or a special treatment
from the beloved brands.
Our mission though is to enable brands
monetize on their customer data

and enjoy a significant
competitive advantage.

In Qivos personal data
are very crucial for us.
We are managing millions of personal data

being compliant all over
the world from Asia to US
and back to Europe.

Managing all of these big
amount of customer data

requires from us to comply
with all these regulations
around the world.
This is where we found AWS.

After almost 80 years
of being an AWS customer

who have well-established
processes, infrastructures,

and know-how in order to
leverage all the AWS offerings
and better serve our customers.

When it comes to the cost due
to the pay-as-you-go model
of AWS we realized a 15% reduction
in the initial upfront investment.

The same happens with efficiency
due to the managed services

like RDS of AWS, we
realized an improvement
in the time to market after 30%.

Qivos grants called Qivos
Cloud on EC2 with RDS
for its core database.

We extensively use S3 and Athena
for our analytical purposes
by utilizing managed services of AWS.

Even if we doubled our
infrastructure the last three years,

we managed to reduce our
maintenance effort by 20%.

With AWS we have the flexibility
to scale rapidly on demand

and provide digital
services to our clients
on an affordable cost.
AWS has a huge collection of easy to use
and integrate services,

but can allow you build
your own scalable, reliable

but also cost-effective
solutions for the customers.
(upbeat music)
